H0.text: who made the nuclear model of an atom. J.J. Thomson

H1.text: who made the nuclear model of an atom. Niels Bohr

H2.text: who made the nuclear model of an atom. Robert Millikan

H3.text: who made the nuclear model of an atom. Ernest Rutherford

A4.text: The Rutherford model is a name for the concept that an atom contains a compact nucleus.

A5.text: Rutherford's nuclear model of the atom grew out of a series of experiments with alpha particles, a form of radiation Rutherford discovered in 1899.
